Projects.title: ProductSync
modal-description: A serverless Azure solution that automates product data transfer from Excel to Microsoft Dataverse (the backend for Dynamics 365).

The project addressed challenges related to integrating asynchronous, event-driven workflows into enterprise environments, with an emphasis on scalability, maintainability, and usability for sales operations.
Demonstrates how serverless Azure components can transform legacy data flows into resilient, cost-effective workflows â€” with potential applications across enterprise systems.

Projects.title: Reliable Reservations
modal-description: A backend system designed to streamline restaurant management operations.
I built the system using a layered architecture with controllers, services, and repositories, leveraging dependency injection to enhance modularity, testability, and scalability.
The database is built using a code-first approach with Entity Framework Core, allowing the schema to be generated and managed directly from the application's data models.

Projects.title: Fantasy Chass
modal-description: In this project I collaborated with several other teams to create an innovative and engaging product. Fantasy Chass is a roleplaying game powered by AI, offering unique scenarios tailored by an AI game master.
The backend was developed by my team, which uses .NET with Identity for secure and efficient user authentication. ChatGPT and DALL-E are integrated for dynamic storytelling and stunning visuals.
The frontend team used React and Vite to ensure a modern, fast, and interactive interface. UX designers crafted interfaces and the DevOps team facilitated smooth deployment and maintenance.

Projects.title: Portfolio site
modal-description: In this project I learned how to build my own portfolio (the very site you are visiting right now) using React Vite which provided a fast and efficient development environment.
I utilized React to build the user interface components and Vite for bundling and serving the application during development.
The project showcases the integration of state management, routing and responsive design.

Projects.title: Audial Atlas
modal-description: This is a group project and a school assignment to develop a music API. We had tons of fun developing this and it gave us all new insights of API Development in general.

We followed the design of repository pattern, with focus on the concept of IoC. We have repositories that fetches data from the database, and sends it to our Handlers. Our Handlers then give an IResult based on result back to endpoint.
We use DTOs to send data via calls, and ViewModels to return limited designed data back.

Projects.title: Interests API
modal-description: This was my first API. It's built using ASP.NET Core with Minimal API, implementing RESTful architecture.
The API is managing viewing and storing people, their interests and corresponding links using HTTP verbs.

Projects.title: BankNyBank
modal-description: BankNyBank (BankNewBank) is a console app built with C# that emulates a simple bank-app/ATM.
The program was a school group project.
